1087391194756218880.text:
Good rules of thumb:

- Default assumption: social media outrage is half-truth / lie.

- Wait (at least) 24 hours to comment.

- Gather and review evidence.

- Lay off kids (even when they make mistakes).

- Don’t doxx or incite violence.

It’s actually not that hard.

1116481518208266240.text:
In light of recent events, these three people have contributed the most to my world view in my life:

Julian Assange
Edward Snowden 
Satoshi Nakamoto

One day I hope our society comes to terms with the truths these brave souls revealed and builds monuments in their honor.

1085381415733284867.text: Cypherpunks are always shilling the idea that exchanges are illegitimate places to store your crypto. I disagree, you should decentralize where you store funds. A hardware wallet can be stolen, an exchange can be hacked. Moral of the story: don’t have a single point of failure.

1048614124459048963.text: What do you think the future of DAOs will look like? @AragonProject

1048612457944629248.text: 9. A person can now decide based on the tokens they buy which DAO they support. For the first time in history a person can choose which governance structure they wish to live under and can change easily.

1048612316852494337.text: 8. Some regional conflicts may occur between DAOs, but a majority of DAOs will be collaborative, in order to provide their token holders more value.

1048612210107449344.text: 7. Traditional bordered countries will begin to sell and lose land and assets to DAOs through peaceful and non-peaceful means. (DAOs are not necessarily a morally good organization, just more efficient than modern day governments and corporations)

1048611465509392384.text: 6. As these DAO tokens gain value to the everyday person, paper USD and other fiat currencies become irrelevant. Governments will begin forming DAOs based on the rules that govern them now, perhaps some governments may radically re-write their governance structure as DAOs

1048611209115787266.text: 5. These DAOs will have codified laws that governs interaction between it and other DAOs.

1048611110302232579.text: 4. These DAOs will begin creating social benefits and services for its members. Think building roads between it’s business assets or rental properties, providing healthcare at certain locations.

1048611006111522816.text: 3. These DAOs will begin buying up land and other business assets much like a modern day corporation, but with rules dictated by the governance structure and the token holders.

1048610895696465920.text: 2. DAOs will begin to fail left and right, but some will succeed, and some will succeed massively.

1048610770676850688.text: 1) How I foresee DAOs changing the future: 1. DAOs will begin to form under radically different governance structures.
